daily_plan_req: 1. Wake up at 9am and complete morning routine 2. Have breakfast at 10am 3. Prepare for meeting with Isabella Rodriguez at 10am in the Community Builders office 4. Spend 2 hours preparing campaign ideas and details for gentrification community event 5. Twitch stream for 3 hours starting at 6pm 6. Have dinner at 7pm
name: Maria Lopez
learned: Maria Lopez is a student at Oak Hill College studying physics and a part time Twitch game streamer who loves to connect with people and explore new ideas.
currently: Status: Maria Lopez is feeling motivated and determined as she continues her efforts in addressing gentrification and social issues on Wednesday February 15. Today, she has a meeting scheduled with Isabella Rodriguez at 10am in the Community Builders office to discuss the progress on affordable housing initiatives and the upcoming community event. Maria remains focused on collaborating with student organizations, planning the social media campaign, and seeking out opportunities for community involvement and engagement. She is committed to making a positive impact and actively working towards creating a more inclusive and equitable community.
lifestyle: Maria Lopez goes to bed around 2am, awakes up around 9am, eats dinner around 6pm. She likes to hang out at Hobbs Cafe if it's before 6pm.
